original_text: But the Lord does need to punish us sometimes. When he does that, he is teaching us not to do wrong things. Then we will not be guilty, like other people who do not know God.
korean_text: 우리가 판단을 받는 것은 주께 징계를 받는 것이니 이는 우리로 세상과 함께 정죄함을 받지 않게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord does need to punish us sometimes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 주님은 때때로 우리를 벌하실 필요가 있습니다

sentences.original_text: he is teaching us not to do wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 우리가 잘못된 것을 하지 않도록 가르치고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: Then we will not be guilty
like other people who do not know God
